actor_awards.notes: A major Hollywood sex symbol of the 1950s and early 1960s. She won the Golden Globe for New Star of the Year for The Wayward Bus (1957). Known for her publicity stunts and comedic roles, her career was cut short by a car accident at age 34.

filmography.title: The Girl Can't Help It
filmography.role_description: A gangster's girlfriend who has no talent for singing but is pushed into stardom by a press agent.
filmography.plot: A gangster hires a down-and-out press agent to make his blonde bombshell girlfriend a recording star in six weeks.

filmography.title: Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?
filmography.role_description: A famous Hollywood actress who uses a mild-mannered writer to make her boyfriend jealous.
filmography.plot: An advertising executive tries to get a Hollywood star to endorse a lipstick to save his job.

filmography.title: The Wayward Bus
filmography.role_description: A burlesque dancer traveling on a bus who reveals a hidden depth of character.
filmography.plot: A group of passengers on a bus trip in California face various personal crises when the bus gets stuck in a landslide.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win â€“ New Star of the Year - Actress

filmography.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner in the Wild West who helps a bumbling English gentleman become sheriff.
filmography.plot: An English gentleman inadvertently becomes the sheriff of a lawless western town and relies on the local saloon owner for help.

filmography.title: Kiss Them for Me
filmography.role_description: A war plant worker who parties with three Navy pilots on leave in San Francisco.
filmography.plot: Three Navy pilots manipulate their way into a four-day leave in San Francisco, looking for parties and women.

filmography.title: The Burglar
filmography.role_description: A member of a burglary team who has unrequited feelings for the leader.
filmography.plot: A burglar and his crew pull off a diamond heist, but the police and a crooked cop are hot on their trail.

filmography.title: Illegal
filmography.role_description: A pianist and singer who becomes entangled with a crime boss.
filmography.plot: A District Attorney resigns in disgrace after sending an innocent man to the chair, then becomes a defense attorney for a crime boss.

filmography.title: Pete Kelly's Blues
filmography.role_description: A small but memorable early role as a cigarette girl in a speakeasy.
filmography.plot: A jazz trumpeter in 1927 Kansas City finds his band threatened by a local mobster who wants a cut of their earnings.

filmography.title: Hell on Frisco Bay
filmography.role_description: A minor role as a blonde woman in this Alan Ladd noir vehicle.
filmography.plot: An ex-cop released from prison searches for the man who framed him for manslaughter.

filmography.title: Promises! Promises!
filmography.role_description: A wife desperate to become pregnant who goes on a cruise; notable for being the first mainstream film to feature a nude scene by a star.
filmography.plot: Two women, both desperate to have a baby, go on a cruise where they encounter a variety of men.

filmography.title: Too Hot to Handle
filmography.role_description: A nightclub performer in London who gets involved with rival strip clubs.
filmography.plot: A French journalist gets mixed up with two rival strip-club owners in London's Soho district.

filmography.title: The Loves of Hercules
filmography.role_description: A dual role as the Queen and an Amazon in this Italian peplum film opposite her husband Mickey Hargitay.
filmography.plot: Hercules falls in love with a princess and must complete several tasks to win her hand, while facing the plotting of a villain.

filmography.title: It Happened in Athens
filmography.role_description: A famous Greek actress who promises to marry the winner of the marathon at the first modern Olympics.
filmography.plot: A young shepherd enters the marathon in the 1896 Olympic Games to win the heart of a famous actress.

filmography.title: The George Raft Story
filmography.role_description: A character based on Betty Grable in this biopic of the gangster actor.
filmography.plot: A biography of George Raft, who rose from a Prohibition-era dancer to a Hollywood movie star known for playing gangsters.

filmography.title: A Guide for the Married Man
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance in a vignette about infidelity.
filmography.plot: A man who loves his wife but is bored with his marriage receives lessons on how to have an affair from his best friend.

filmography.title: Panic Button
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman chosen to star in a film intended to be a tax loss flop.
filmography.plot: A businessman plans to make a movie that is a guaranteed flop to solve his tax problems, but the film becomes a hit.

filmography.title: Single Room Furnished
filmography.role_description: Mansfield plays three different women dealing with heartbreak in her final film released posthumously.
filmography.plot: A woman takes on different personas as she faces a series of romantic failures and tragedies.

filmography.title: Dog Eat Dog
filmography.role_description: A glamorous accomplice in a robbery scheme involving a million dollars.
filmography.plot: Three criminals rob a US currency shipment in the Mediterranean, but greed and betrayal tear the group apart.

filmography.title: The Fat Spy
filmography.role_description: A young woman on an island searching for the fountain of youth in this campy comedy.
filmography.plot: A group of teenagers discover an island rumored to hold the fountain of youth, while a spy tries to steal the secret.

filmography.title: Las Vegas Hillbillys
filmography.role_description: A city slicker who helps a hillbilly run a casino he inherited.
filmography.plot: A hillbilly inherits a Las Vegas casino and tries to turn it into a country music venue with the help of his friends.

filmography.title: Female Jungle
filmography.role_description: A film noir role where she plays a woman involved in a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A police detective tries to reconstruct the events of a night he cannot remember to solve the murder of a Hollywood starlet.

filmography.title: The Challenge
filmography.role_description: A gang leader's girlfriend who gets involved with a thief in this British crime thriller.
filmography.plot: A criminal is hired to steal a payroll but finds himself caught between the police and a ruthless gang.

filmography.title: Primitive Love
filmography.role_description: An anthropologist demonstrating mating rituals in this 'mondo' style documentary comedy.
filmography.plot: Two anthropologists observe and comment on the mating habits of various cultures around the world.

filmography.title: Spree
filmography.role_description: Appears as herself in this documentary-style film about Las Vegas nightlife.
filmography.plot: A documentary exploring the nightlife and entertainment of Las Vegas, featuring various celebrities.

filmography.title: Homesick for St. Pauli
filmography.role_description: A rare German-language role for Mansfield, singing in a musical.
filmography.plot: A pop singer returns to Hamburg from the United States and gets involved in the local music scene.
